text: Felipe Andres Coronel (born February 19, 1978 in Lima, Peru) is an American rapper better known by his stage name Immortal Technique. Immortal Technique's lyrics are usually about politics and racism. == Albums == ===Studio albums=== Year Album 2001 Revolutionary Vol. 1 2003 Revolutionary Vol. 2 2008 The 3rd World ===Compilation albums=== Year Album 2011 The Martyr == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==Other websites== * Immortal Technique's Twitter Category:1978 births Category:American activists Category:Rappers from New York (state) Category:Living people Category:Peruvian entertainers Category:American poets Category:Singers from New York City Category:Writers from Lima
title: Immortal Technique
